channel.title: Req: Is there a way to change it so a shop can only be seen by admins?
channel.description:
is there a way to change a shop so only admins can trade and other wise it says something like "you need to be an admin"
thanks

item.title: Req: Is there a way to change it so a shop can only be seen by admins?
item.dc:creator: @Mmmm_Java Mmmm Java
item.description:
@Mmmm_Java wrote:

look for where it opens shops in client.java:

} else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop }
and add && playerRights>0 to the if statement so it looks like this

} else if (NPCID == 553 && playerRights>0) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop }

Read full topic
item.source: Req: Is there a way to change it so a shop can only be seen by admins?
